content: “Their tongues shoot out lies
A mighty army of liars,
They advance from one evil to the next,
“Be wary of even longtime neighbors.
Brother schemes against brother,
Friend against friend
Neighbors gyp neighbors,
They’ve trained their tongues to tell lies,
They pile wrong upon wrong, stack lie upon lie,
Therefore, -of-the-Angel-Armies says:
“Watch this! I’ll melt them down
What else can I do
Their tongues are poison arrows!
Neighbor greets neighbor with a smile,
Do you think I’m going to stand around and do nothing?”
“Don’t you think I’ll take serious measures

I asked, “Is there anyone around bright enough to tell us what’s going on here? Anyone who has the inside story from  and can let us in on it?“Why is the country wasted?“Why no travelers in this desert?”

’s answer: “Because they abandoned my plain teaching. They wouldn’t listen to anything I said, refused to live the way I told them to. Instead they lived any way they wanted and took up with the Baal gods, who they thought would give them what they wanted—following the example of their parents.” And this is the consequence. -of-the-Angel-Armies says so:“I’ll feed them with pig slop.“I’ll give them poison to drink.
“Then I’ll scatter them far and wide among godless peoples that neither they nor their parents have ever heard of, and I’ll send Death in pursuit until there’s nothing left of them.”
A Life That Is All Outside but No Inside
A Message from -of-the-Angel-Armies:
“Look over the trouble we’re in and call for help.
Tell them to hurry—
Help us get our tears flowing,
Listen to it!
‘We’re a ruined people,
We’ve been driven from our homes
Mourning women! Oh, listen to ’s Message!
Teach your daughters songs for the dead
Death has climbed in through the window,
Children on the playgrounds drop dead,
Speak up! “’s Message:
“‘Dead bodies everywhere, scattered at random
Like wheat cut down by reapers
’s Message:
“Don’t let the wise brag of their wisdom.
Don’t let the rich brag of their riches.
That you understand and know me.
I do what’s right and set things right and fair,
These are my trademarks.”

“Stay alert! It won’t be long now”—’s Decree!—“when I will personally deal with everyone whose life is all outside but no inside: Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammon, Moab. All these nations are big on performance religion—including Israel, who is no better.”
